location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: List detailing letters sent by Pelly prior to 12 October 1872:No. 1634/676 to Commander Keats (see folio three)No. 1635/677 Forwarding to Major (Edward Charles) Ross Government Resolution No. 5446 of 14 September 1872No. 1636/678 Forwarding Government Resolution No. 5575 of 24 SeptemberNo. 1638/680 Forwarding Endorsement No. 5581 od 25 September 1872 sanctioning 1000 rupees for repairs of Muscat Agency BuildingsNo. 1640/682 Forwarding to Captain (Charles) Grant Government Resolution No. 5442 of 14 September 1872 regarding the Establishment of a Post Office at Bahrain and the appointment of a Post Master at that port.
